TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class TextBox Inherits TextBoxBase Implements IAddChild
type TextBox = class inherit TextBoxBase interface IAddChild
.class public auto ansi TextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可用于显示或编辑无格式文本。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to display or edit unformatted text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在其属性中只能包含无格式文本 。A control can contain only unformatted text in its property. 下图显示了一个示例 。The following graphic shows an example of a . ![TextBox 屏幕快照](~/add/media/ss-ctl-textbox.gif "TextBox 屏幕快照")![TextBox screen shot](~/add/media/ss-ctl-textbox.gif "TextBox screen shot") TextBox 示例Example of a TextBox 是由多个封装的组件组成的复合控件。 is a composite control that is composed of several encapsulated components. 因此，某些事件不会向上冒泡到包含控件，因为它们由封装的子元素处理。Consequently, some events do not bubble up to the containing control because they are handled by encapsulated child elements. 因此，应用程序开发人员应侦听由前缀 "Preview" ) 表示 (事件的隧道版本。Because of this, application developers should listen for the tunneling version of an event (denoted by the prefix "Preview"). 仅支持未格式化文本。 supports unformatted text only. 有关需要支持更丰富内容的应用程序，请参阅 。For applications that require support for richer content, see . 对于需要接受密码或其他敏感输入的应用程序，请参阅 。For applications that need to accept passwords or other sensitive input, see . 使用和属性在中水平和垂直对齐文本 。Horizontally and vertically aligning text within a is done with the and properties. 通过和属性在页面布局中对齐 。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. 隐藏周围边框的最佳方式 是将 的属性设置 为 `0` 。The best way to hide the border around a is to set the property of the to `0`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为冒泡和事件提供内置处理 。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此， 不会调用在中侦听或事件的自定义事件处理程序 。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for or events from a will not be called. 如果需要响应这些事件，请改为侦听隧道 和 事件，或使用参数注册处理程序 (此后一选项仅可通过代码) 使用。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不要将事件标记为 "已处理"，除非你有意要禁用 这些事件的本机处理，并注意这会对控件的产生显著影响 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 默认情况下，滚动条在上不可见 。Scrollbars are not visible on a by default. 若要使滚动条可见，请将 和 属性设置为 或 。To make scrollbars visible, set the and properties to or . 通常， 事件应该用于在或更改中的文本时进行检测， 而不是像预期那样进行检测 。Usually the event should be used to detect whenever the text in a or changes rather then as you might expect. 有关示例，请参阅 [如何：在文本框中的文本发生更改时进行检测](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed) 。See [How to: Detect When Text in a TextBox Has Changed](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed) for an example. ## 自定义 TextBox 控件Customizing the TextBox Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [TextBox 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/textbox-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TextBox Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/textbox-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 Text 属性设置 TextBox 控件的初始文本内容。This example shows how to use the Text property to set the initial text contents of a TextBox control. > [!NOTE] > 尽管 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 版本的示例可以在 \ 每个按钮的 TextBox 内容的文本周围使用标记，但这并不是必需的，因为 TextBox 将 ContentPropertyAttribute 属性应用于 text 属性。Although the Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) version of the example could use the \ tags around the text of each button's TextBox content, it is not necessary because the TextBox applies the ContentPropertyAttribute attribute to the Text property. ```xaml Initial text contents of the TextBox. ``` ```csharp tbSettingText.Text = "Initial text contents of the TextBox."; ``` ```vb tbSettingText.Text = "Initial text contents of the TextBox." ``` 有关其他示例，请参阅本文档的4.0 版本： [TextBox 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms617604\(v=vs.100\).aspx)。For additional examples, see the 4.0 version of this document: [TextBox Class](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms617604\(v=vs.100\).aspx).

summary.span: 获取或设置插入符号的插入位置索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the insertion position index of the caret.

value.span: 插入符号的从零开始的插入位置索引。

span.span: The zero-based insertion position index of the caret.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回插入符号的当前插入位置索引 (参阅 以获取有关 "插入位置" ) 的术语的信息。Getting this property returns the current insertion position index of the caret (see for information on terminology like "insertion position"). 设置此属性会将插入符号移动到指定的插入位置。Setting this property moves the caret to the specified insertion position. 插入位置介于字符或元素标记之间。An insertion position is between either characters or element tags.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::CharacterCasing CharacterCasing { System::Windows::Controls::CharacterCasing get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::CharacterCasing value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置向文本框中手动输入字符时如何确定字符的大小写格式。

span.span: Gets or sets how characters are cased when they are manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 值之一，指定如何确定手动输入字符的大小写格式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how manually entered characters are cased.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不会影响以编程方式添加的字符。This property does not affect characters that are added programmatically. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在文本框中将所有手动输入的字符转换为大写。The following example shows how to use the property to convert all manually entered characters to uppercase in a text box. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#CharacterCasingExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/charactercasingexample.xaml#charactercasingexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CharacterCasingExample.cs#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/charactercasingexample.vb#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 获取文本框中的总行数。

span.span: Gets the total number of lines in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中的总行数; 如果布局信息不可用，则为-1。

span.span: The total number of lines in the text box, or -1 if layout information is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了文本换行，则更改文本框的宽度可能会更改此值。If text wrapping is enabled, changing the width of the text box may change this value. 返回的值是文本框中的总行数，而不考虑当前显示的行数。The value returned is the total number of lines in the text box, regardless of how many are currently visible.

summary.span: 获取或设置可在文本框中手动输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 可在文本框中手动输入的最大字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示没有限制。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来限制控件中输入的文本长度，以获取邮政编码和电话号码之类的值。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers. 当数据存储在数据库中时，还可以使用此属性来限制输入的文本长度，以便在控件中输入的文本不会超过数据库中对应字段的最大长度。You can also use this property to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be stored in a database so that the text entered into the control does not exceed the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. 此属性不会影响以编程方式添加的字符。This property does not affect characters that are added programmatically. 当此属性设置为0时，可在控件中输入的文本的最大长度仅受可用内存的限制。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is limited only by available memory. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用 500 个字符创建一个。The following example shows how to create a with a of 500 characters. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#TextBoxExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/textboxexample.xaml#textboxexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#TextBoxCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/TextBoxExample.cs#textboxcodeexampleinline1)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#TextBoxCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/textboxexample.vb#textboxcodeexampleinline1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回的当前值 。Getting this property returns the current value of . 设置此属性将导致文本框在可见行数超出指定的限制时调整大小 。Setting this property causes the text box to resize if the number of visible lines exceeds the limit specified by . 此属性仅适用于可见行，不约束实际的行数。This property applies only to visible lines, and does not constrain the actual number of lines. 根据其配置，文本框可能包含可通过滚动访问的其他不可见的行。Depending on its configuration, a text box may contain additional non-visible lines that are accessible by scrolling. 如果在 上显式设置了属性 ，则 和 属性值将被忽略。If the property is explicitly set on a , the and property values are ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 值为5的。The following example shows how to create a with a value of 5. summary.span: 获取或设置文本框中当前选择的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中当前选定的文本。

span.span: The currently selected text in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前选定文本的字符串副本。Getting this property returns a string copy of the currently selected text. 设置此属性会将当前所选内容替换为指定的字符串。Setting this property replaces the current selection with the specified string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本框中当前选择的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中当前选择的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前选定内容中的字符数。Getting this property returns the number of characters in the current selection. 设置此属性会将当前所选内容的长度调整为指定的值，并保持选择范围的开头。Setting this property adjusts the length of the current selection to the specified value, keeping the beginning of the selection fixed. 通常，当指定的选择长度导致所选内容在无效位置结束时 (例如，在回车符和换行字符之间，或在标记) 中，选择长度会自动调整，以便所生成的选择在有效位置开始和结束。In general, when the specified selection length causes the selection to end in an invalid position (for example, between a carriage return and a new-line character, or inside a tag), the selection length automatically adjusts so that the resulting selection starts and ends in valid positions.

span.span: is set to a negative value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionStart : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选择的起始位置的字符索引。

span.span: Gets or sets a character index for the beginning of the current selection.

value.span: 当前选择的起始位置的字符索引。

span.span: The character index for the beginning of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的选择长度将导致选定内容在回车符和换行字符之间结束，则选择长度会自动增加1，使所得到的选择跨越整个行尾标记。In cases where the specified selection length would cause the selection to end between a carriage return and a new-line character, the selection length is automatically increased by 1 so that the resulting selection spans the entire end-of-line marker.

span.span: is set to a negative value.

summary.span: 获取要应用到文本框的文本修饰。

span.span: The default is (no text decorations applied).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是可添加到文本的视觉对象装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四种类型的文本修饰：下划线、基线、删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：创建文本修饰](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用 作为示例元素来设置特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_textdecxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：具有默认删除线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "屏幕快照：具有默认删除线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下图显示了 、 和 修饰的分别呈现方式。The following figures show how the , , and decorations render, respectively. ![屏幕快照：上划线 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "屏幕快照：上划线 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![屏幕快照：文本上的默认基线效果](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "屏幕快照：文本上的默认基线效果")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![屏幕快照：具有默认下划线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "屏幕快照：具有默认下划线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. value.span: 有关默认版式值的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of default typography values, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] 字体。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 版式变体对不支持变体的字体不起作用。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 有关此主题的详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的版式](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf)。For more information about this topic, see [Typography in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用 作为示例元素来设置特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TypogXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_typogxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "屏幕快照：改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 与此相反，下图显示了一个具有默认版式属性的类似示例的呈现效果。In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders. ![屏幕快照：改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "屏幕快照：改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_typog)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_typog)]
